title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: Crypto Magazine #1 Collector's EditionLOT 2: Omni June 1991 magazine LOT 3: Denarium Souvenir Book #8/50*Original thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5298216LOT 4: Red Room Trigger Warnings #3 set*Info thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5399706LOT 5: 2x Rinus VeeKay autograph page*Lot 5 will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous auctionsSTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0001BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: FEBRUARY 25th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: DECLINE TO BE LISTED

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Lot 2: 0.0001Lot 4: 0.0002Regarding Red Room "set" - does it mean soft cover + Ed Piskor variant as seen here: https://www.fantagraphics.com/collections/ed-piskor/products/red-room-trigger-warnings-3?variant=42182815777014?Anyone read that thing - is it good?

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on February 23, 2023, 11:38:44 PMLot 2: 0.0001Quote from: raritycheck on February 23, 2023, 07:37:51 AMLot 3 - 0.0011Quote from: Kryptowerk on February 23, 2023, 11:38:44 PMLot 4: 0.0002Quote from: tweetious on February 20, 2023, 09:34:44 PMLOT 5: 2 @ 0.0001BTCCurrent high bidQuote from: Kryptowerk on February 23, 2023, 11:38:44 PMLot 2: 0.0001Lot 4: 0.0002Regarding Red Room "set" - does it mean soft cover + Ed Piskor variant as seen here: https://www.fantagraphics.com/collections/ed-piskor/products/red-room-trigger-warnings-3?variant=42182815777014?Anyone read that thing - is it good?yes.. I guess technically it is not a "set" in the traditional sense... but same comic with alternate covers.And yes... I got to read the copy I bought.. and was fun.. continues the story of the 10k btc pizza transaction!
